contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Kawakami |JapaneseName= 川上村 |settlement_type= Village |MapImage= Kawakami in Nara Prefecture.png |Region= [[Kansai region|Kansai]] |Prefecture= [[Nara Prefecture]] |District= [[Yoshino District, Nara|Yoshino]] |Area_km2= 269.16 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 2,286 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 34 |LatitudeMinutes = 20 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 135 |LongtitudeMinutes = 57 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.vill.kawakami.nara.jp/ Village of Kawakami] }} {{nihongo|'''Kawakami'''|川上村|Kawakami-mura}} is a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Yoshino District, Nara|Yoshino District]], [[Nara Prefecture|Nara]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the village has an estimated [[population]] of 2,286 and a [[population density|density]] of 8.49 persons per km². The total area is 269.16 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.vill.kawakami.nara.jp/ Kawakami official website] {{ja icon}} {{Nara Prefecture}} [[Category:Villages in Nara Prefecture]] {{Nara-geo-stub}}
